about_the_game:
The game immerses you in the story of a young boy who finds himself in a dark world plagued by disease. The setting takes place in northern lands captured by a southern empire. As a result, the in-game culture blends Viking and Ancient Roman motifs. The main character possesses telekinetic powers, allowing him to interact with the world in various ways. You can use telekinesis to distract enemies, send them on false paths, frighten them, or play pranks on them. These abilities can be combined to find your unique way of playing through the game.

Telekinesis

Telekinesis is a key feature of the game. Almost everything around is interactive: sticks, jars, food, fences, armor, stones — all these can be lifted, picked up, or thrown. Many of these items have unique properties that help solve puzzles or handle opponents. Boxes can be climbed to reach high places, fermented fish causes coughing due to its strong smell, and spider milk makes everything incredibly sticky — these are just a few of the interactive items you can use in the game. How will you use them? Distract enemies, lead them astray, scare or tease them? The choice is yours.

Puzzles

The game often presents challenges that require some thought before progressing further. The most difficult ones are situated in places holding the most valuable treasures.

Multiple Paths

Each level in the game can be completed in various ways. Every game challenge can be solved in numerous ways. The variety of interactive items allows players to find their most interesting way of completing the game.

Avoidance

Sometimes a fight may be too dangerous for direct confrontation. In such situations, you can look for a way to bypass enemies, keeping your distance.

Stealth

Enemies stand directly on the most convenient path? No problem. Passing by enemies unseen is the true mark of skill.

Battles

Few enemies, or do you feel you have a strong tactical position? You can try unleashing all your power on them! Just remember, any misstep could be fatal.

Exploration

The locations in the game are spacious and contain many hidden corners. By exploring the world around you, you can find interesting characters, unlock new ways to progress, develop new abilities for the main character, and learn more about the game's world. Of course, not everything will be on the surface, and you'll often need to think hard to reach the desired reward.

World

The main character lives in a northern kingdom, which was once occupied by a powerful southern empire. As a result, pagan northern customs merged with a unified imperial culture, creating a unique atmosphere and new folklore and interesting customs. Under these conditions, the protagonist and his sister face a terrible disease — the plague. The plague cares not for gods; it brings only death and decay. Our heroes must find a way to survive in these challenging times.

Story

The game tells the tale of a boy who had to face adult hardships too soon. After a tragic barbarian attack on the protagonist's home village, everything goes awry. His father falls ill, and Alex is tormented by terrible resentment and guilt, while the path to seek help in the city seems insurmountably dangerous. However, if the barbarians decide to attack again, they will not wait.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later 64-bit (latest update)
  • Processor: intel Core i5-6600K or AMD Ryzen R5 1600 processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti or AMD Radeon RX 580
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later 64-bit (latest update)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-9600K or AMD Ryzen 5 3600 processor
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 or AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: An adventure stealth-action game about a boy with telekinetic powers during the onset of a plague epidemic. Almost everything around is interactive! Use the environment to reach places that seem impossible to access, outsmart enemies, and fight battles that seem unwinnable.
